mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message SET message_sender = #{messageSender}, message_receiver = #{messageReceiver}, message = #{message}, message_send_time = now(), chatroom_id = #{chatroomId}
mapper.select: SELECT message_id AS messageId, message_sender AS messageSender, message_receiver AS messageReceiver, message, message_send_time AS sendTime, message_read_time AS readTime, chatroom_id AS chatroomId FROM message WHERE chatroom_id = #{chatroomId} ORDER BY message_id ASC
